name: Life of Doggo
description:
Life of Doggo

Life of Doggo is an interactive fiction game that takes you through the day of a dog. Will you be a happy good dog at the end of the day?

Team

Lead Designer and Programmer: Jared Long

  • Student of California State Monterey Bay working on a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science with concentration in Game Development

Lead Artist: Kathia Arias

  • Student of University of California Santa Cruz working on a Bachelor's Degree in Spanish Studies with concentration in Language and Linguistics

Lead Doggo Inspiration: Yeti

  • 12 year old American Eskimo and Pomeranian mix working on taking more naps and eating more types of food.
Music

Background music by PlayOnLoop.com
